Question: In a troubled and apprehensive world, this person has proved once again that laughter is the best medicine.
Hints: This person also appeared in film roles such as Major Major in Catch-22 and Papa Elf in Elf.
By 1982, this person was interested in a new sitcom.
George than a choirboy, this person has wounded, if not slain, many of the dragons that stalk our society.
